fields.name: Quest (Passive):
fields.value: Each day, the town votes 2 players to go on a quest. They are both given the option to assist or betray the quest the following evening. After 3 quests with no betrayals, 3 people go on quests, after 5 successful quests, you die. After an unsuccessful quest, roleblock the questers. After 2 unsuccessful quests, unlock Fire Breath.

fields.name: Fire Breath (Locked, 1x 150% charge):
fields.value: Rampage attack at a players house

fields.name: Rawwwwwr >:
fields.value: 3**: Rampaging roleblock at a players house. That player also is silenced the next day and receives the message "*you've been frightened and cannot speak.*"
